text: (UMûsâ) wathi: “Hamba umke. Inene isohlwayo sakho kulo mhlaba siya kuba kukuba wena uthi: “Ungandichukumisi”3 kananjalo, inene wena unesithembiso (soBomi oBuzayo) ongayi kusilela ukusigcina. Khawujonge ‘kuthixo’ wakho lowo ubukade uzinikele kuye. Siya kumtshisa Size Simvuthelele (eluthuthu) elwandle ngesithonga
